about_the_game:
Welcome back to Circle Empires! 

You guys give up, or are you thirsty for more?

Circle back to the latest chapter in the fast-paced real-time strategy series where you expand your empire, circle by circle, in CIRCLE EMPIRES 2! Conquer a world of interconnected circles filled with resources, enemies, and strategic challenges. Build your armies, conquer enemy bosses, and adapt to ever-changing worlds that make each playthrough unique. With new units, weapons, and play modes, you can team up with friends or compete alone for glory. Whether you're a newcomer or a seasoned strategist, the battle for disc-shaped dominance never stops — when are YOU going to get round to facing the next challenge?

The CIRCLE EMPIRES 2 universe is made up of... circles! Each one is its own little ecosystem, teeming with resources, wildlife, and enemies. Conquer them all to expand your empire, but beware: each circle holds new dangers, from vicious villains to brutal bosses. Your mission? Fight, Conquer, Expand! Unite all circles under your rule.

UNITS GALORE Increase your sphere of influence, by building and commanding an army of diverse units, each with unique skills and abilities. From fierce warriors and sneaky archers to powerful mages and mighty beasts, the right mix of troops is the key to victory. Units can gain experience, level up, and even be mounted onto larger creatures for added mobility and power. Plus, they now have facial expressions, so you can read the battlefield like never before.

A NEVERENDING KERFUFFLE Every playthrough brings a new world to explore, filled with different circles, biomes, and challenges. No two games are the same! Whether you prefer to strategize at a leisurely pace or dive headfirst into chaos, CIRCLE EMPIRES 2 offers a range of difficulty settings to suit your style. Plus, the new randomly generated maps ensure endless replayability as you face different obstacles and enemies each time.

MULTIPLAYER What’s better than building your empire alone? Doing it with (or against) your pals! In multiplayer mode, you can team up with allies to conquer the world together or compete against each other to see who can build the strongest empire. With unique factions, cooperative gameplay, and competitive modes, multiplayer takes the action to the next level and creates an endless challenge.

FOR THE PEOPLE THAT KNOW AND LOVE CIRCLE EMPIRES:

Circle Empires 2 takes everything you love about the original game and adds even more strategic depth, variety, and fun. We've introduced new units, weapons, and terrain effects to keep you coming round for more. There’s also a brand-new mounting system that lets any unit ride another larger one. Want to put a mage on a bear? Go for it! 

Expect more customization, more ways to play, and of course, plenty of conquest that awaits you. Whether you’re setting up mazes of towers and moats to fend off foes or experimenting with new strategies, there’s something here for every Circle Empires fan.

KEY FEATURES:

  • Fast-paced Real-Time Strategy gameplay: Build, expand, and battle kingdom after kingdom.

  • Endless replayability: Randomly generated worlds with unique flora, fauna, and enemies keep every game fresh.

  • Diverse units and upgrades: From archers to necromancers, every unit can level up, gain experience, and ride larger creatures.

  • Mounting system: Combine units creatively—mount smaller units on larger creatures for unique advantages.

  • Improved AI and tactics: Enemies use smarter strategies, forcing you to adapt and rethink your approach.

  • Multiplayer modes: Play cooperatively or competitively with friends.

  • Dynamic biomes: Explore a range of environments to conquer and use them to your advantage, from scorching deserts to eerie swamps and use each captured circle to your advantage as it affects your gameplay.

  • Rich customization: Adjust settings, tweak difficulties, and tailor your game to your liking.

  • Exciting new features: Experience new units, buildings, terrain effects, and upgrades that add depth and strategy.

Circle Empires brings a fresh twist to the original formula, offering new ways to conquer, build, and explore. Ready to circle back in? The circles await!

name: Circle Empires 2

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel i3 4130 or AMD FX 6300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 or AMD RX460
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Circle Empires 2 can be played on significantly older devices but larger maps and numbers of units will effect performance. The minimum requirements aim to facilitate all scenarios of normal gameplay.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel i5 6700K or AMD R5 1500X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1650 or AMD RX480
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: CIRCLE EMPIRES returns! Expand your empire, circle by circle, in this fast-paced follow-up to the hit RTS. Gather resources, build armies, and defeat bosses (or your friends) in a world that changes with every game. With unique units and biomes, it's an addictive battle of wits and tactics.
supported_languages: English, French, German, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Spain
